title: Self-Directed Mathematics Learning Module Design for Corporate Managers

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental arithmetic operations and comprehension of basic mathematical concepts
context.additional_context: Most learners are non-math majors, with the goal of strengthening data analysis and decision-making skills encountered in their work

learning_goals: Learners acquire the ability to mathematically interpret work-related data and represent it graphically.
Learners perform a project to solve budget allocation problems using spreadsheet-based tools.
Learners quantitatively measure their learning progress and comprehension using a self-assessment checklist.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
